name: Unseen Forest
description:
A radiation worker survived a huge explosion and almost lost his eye perception. He could only see things close to him. In order to know what happened in the city, he must grope in an unseen forest and find a way out. The animals from the forest guided him on his way. Finally, he walked out and ...

Control: W, A, S, D to change direction, J & K to move one step

Recommend wearing a headphone, the audio panning will show you where you should go.

Programming, composer, designer: Zekai Gong (NEU)

Artist, sound designer, designer: Qirui Lin (NEU)
